message.content:
cs.SE, cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.HC. 

The paper discusses the construction of confident safety arguments, which is a topic related to software engineering (cs.SE) and computer security (cs.CR). The use of hazard analysis techniques and the design of safety measures also involves artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and systems and control (cs.SY). Additionally, the discussion of computer-assisted construction of safety cases suggests a potential application in human-computer interaction (cs.HC).
